summary: Completed comprehensive testing of provider and client dashboards with availability calendar. All backend APIs (13/13 tests) and frontend flows working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/auth/login - provider login successful
Backend: POST /api/auth/login - client login successful
Backend: GET /api/providers/user/{user_id} - returns provider profile with rating and reviews
Backend: GET /api/availability/{provider_id}?month=YYYY-MM - returns blocked dates for month
Backend: GET /api/availability/{provider_id} - returns all blocked dates
Backend: POST /api/availability - blocks date successfully
Backend: POST /api/availability - unblocks date successfully
Backend: POST /api/availability - returns 401 without authentication
Backend: GET /api/bookings?role=provider - returns provider bookings
Backend: GET /api/bookings?role=client - returns client bookings
Backend: GET /api/bookings - returns 401 without authentication
Backend: Provider dashboard data flow integration test
Backend: Client dashboard data flow integration test
Frontend: Homepage loads correctly
Frontend: Provider login and redirect to dashboard
Frontend: Provider dashboard displays 'Espace Prestataire' title
Frontend: Provider dashboard shows stats (En attente, Confirmées, Note, Revenus)
Frontend: Calendar displays current month (Février 2026)
Frontend: Calendar navigation (prev/next month) works
Frontend: Calendar shows blocked dates in red with lock icon
Frontend: Date selection shows action panel with Bloquer/Débloquer button
Frontend: Blocking a date updates calendar and shows toast notification
Frontend: Calendar stats show blocked days count and reservations count
Frontend: 'Demandes en attente' section displays correctly
Frontend: 'Mon Profil' section shows provider details
Frontend: Client login and redirect to dashboard
Frontend: Client dashboard displays 'Mon Espace' title
Frontend: Client dashboard shows tabs (Vue d'ensemble, Mes réservations)
Frontend: Client dashboard shows stats (En attente, Confirmées, Total)
Frontend: Quick actions section with 4 buttons (Prestataires, Packs, Messages, Marketplace)
Frontend: Quick action Prestataires navigates to /search
Frontend: Quick action Packs navigates to /packages
Frontend: Quick action Messages navigates to /messages
Frontend: Quick action Marketplace navigates to /marketplace
Frontend: 'Devenir prestataire' button visible for clients

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all dashboard and calendar flows working correctly)

seed_data_creation: Used existing test users. Blocked dates 2026-02-10 and 2026-02-20 for provider_763e835b5db2.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard and availability calendar features fully functional. Provider dashboard shows calendar with monthly navigation, date blocking/unblocking, stats (pending, confirmed, rating, revenue), pending requests section, and profile summary. Client dashboard shows tabs (overview, bookings), stats, and quick action buttons for navigation. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_dashboard_availability.py cover all availability endpoints.
